347070.name: Ratz Instagib – Original Soundtrack
347070.description:
The complete Ratz Instagib soundtrack, created by Jazzsticks. Every purchase supports the artists involved – great to listen to, even when you're not blasting rats to pieces with a railgun!

Track Listing:

  • 1) – Telly's Theme (Paul SG / Carter)
  • 2) – A Lot To Talk About (Paul SG / Carter)
  • 3) – Night At Spotlite (Paul SG)
  • 4) – Extract Of The Essence (Paul SG)
  • 5) – Moonrise Jet (Flowrian)
  • 6) – Jazzmerising (Rowpieces)
  • 7) – City Trip (Pulsaar / Paul SG)
  • 8) - Shicu (The Jazzassins)
  • 9) - Simple Procedures (The Jazzassins)
  • 10) - True Connaisseurs (The Jazzassins)
  • 11) - Maximus (FLOWRIAN)
  • 12) - Sometimes We Forget (FLOWRIAN)
  • 13) - Chief Grand Master (Paul SG)
  • 14) - Reentry (Sinbin)

Check out more of Jazzsticks' jazz-inspired drum and bass on Facebook, Twitter and Soundcloud!
